fields.name: contains
fields.type: Optional < CollectionContentsPredicate < T , P extends Predicate < T >>>
fields.description: The field for the contains record component.

fields.name: counts
fields.type: Optional < CollectionCountsPredicate < T , P extends Predicate < T >>>
fields.description: The field for the counts record component.

fields.name: size
fields.description: The field for the size record component.

constructors.name: CollectionPredicate
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a CollectionPredicate record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) .

methods.name: contains
methods.description: Returns the value of the contains record component.

methods.name: counts
methods.description: Returns the value of the counts record component.

methods.name: size
methods.description: Returns the value of the size record component.
